subject: Corruption (Institutional)
Soccer
Organizations, Societies and Clubs
lead_paragraph: Blatter said that his decision to step down as FIFA president was “liberating” and that he expected the election to replace him to be held in early 2016.
snippet: Blatter said that his decision to step down as FIFA president was “liberating” and that he expected the election to replace him to be held in early 2016.
